metadata.name: Intuition I
metadata.description:
Digitally Painted and Animated
Silent, Endless Video
rr
2014

Intuition I is one out of 7 pieces of animated portraits, first exhibited on rr's solo show at Aaran Gallery, Tehran, back in 2014. 4 of these pieces (Intuition I, II, III, IV) will be minted as single edition NFTs in this collection.
